text:
e="preserve">Maria Diletta Veronese (born 4 November 1982) is an Italian rugby player. She was a member of the Italian Women's Rugby team. She participated at the 2009 Rugby World Cup Sevens, 2009 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2010 Six Nations Championship, 2011 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2013 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2014 Women's Six Nations Championship, and 2015 Six Nations Championship.
She graduated from Accademia di Belle Arti di Venezia.

annotations.surface_form: Accademia di Belle Arti di Venezia
